activities: Personal information received in the U.S. will concern or relate to customer data. Customers include buyers, lessees and guarantors (large fleet and smaller owner-operators) as well as dealers of Volvo Group products and services. Personal information will include, for example, customer names and addresses.  Personal information will be used for example to perform and process customer satisfaction surveys at  both VFS's U.S. office as well as its agent-vendors' offices in the U.S. and European Union. This will include the possibility of contacting specific customers who respond to such surveys.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer information -- off-line; on-line; manually processed, HR Data
